column1: | SO400 LONDON ST PANCRAS INTERNATIONAL TO HIGH SPEED 1/ET                             |         |         |      |                                           |
| TIMING POINT                                                                         | DOWN    | UP      | CODE | NOTES                                     |
| Line codes on SO400 apply forward from the timing point against which they are shown |         |         |      |                                           |
| London St Pancras International                                                      | DNC     |         |      | Platform detail must be shown             |
| Regents Canal Junction                                                               |         |         | X    | To/from York Way North Junction –         |
| York Way South Junction                                                              | DNC     | DNC     |      | To/from Cedar Junction – SO420            |
| Stratford International West                                                         | TPM     | DNC     |      | To/from Temple Mills Depot – SO430        |
| Stratford International                                                              | DNC     | DNC     | S    | Platform detail must be shown             |
| Dagenham Dock Junction                                                               | DNC     | DNC     |      | To/from Ripple Lane Exchange Sidings -    |
| Ebbsfleet International                                                              | DNC     | DNC     | S    | Platform detail must be shown             |
|                                                                                      | UPC     | UPC     |      | To/from Springhead Road Junction –        |
| Southfleet Junction                                                                  | DNC     | DNC     |      | To/from Fawkham Junction – SO460          |
| Lenham Crossover                                                                     | DNC     | DNC     |      | Line codes  DNL or UPL must be used for   |
|                                                                                      | UPC     | UPC     |      | trains travelling into Lenham Heath Loop  |
| Lenham Heath Loop                                                                    | -       | UPC     | F S  |                                           |
| Charing Crossover                                                                    |         | UPL     | X    | Timing point for trains crossing to enter |
|                                                                                      |         | DNL     |      | Lenham Heath Loop in the Up Direction     |
